RewardsPay ( formerly Koinz Media Inc.)  is a consumer payments service that allows online shoppers to pay with credit card cash rewards, points or frequent flier airline miles for goods and services.

Offerpal Media ( now called Tapjoy, Inc.) created a alternative payments platform where consumers could earn virtual currency from their favorite games by trying or buying goods and services from advertisers. Offerpal acquired Tapjoy and created the  " mobile value exchange " scaling to reach over a billion mobile devices.

recommendations: Ed Gadziemski
Principal Business & Technology Consultant
June 18, 2015, Ed worked with Anu but at different companies

Anu loves challenges. When I met her, I'd been assigned the keep/drop decision regarding my company's use of Uniface software. When she heard that, the V12 engine that drives her success switched into high performance mode and she made it her mission to ensure I made the right decision.Which turned out to be keep, naturally. Thanks to her dogged perseverance and the efforts engaged in at Uniface on our behalf, I was able to rescue Comsearch's modernization project and save our financial and time investment.Since then, I've followed her career with awe as she tackled one huge challenge after another. Even when faced with adversity that would stop ordinary humans in their tracks, Anu's ability to take disaster and turn it into success has shined through again and again.She is a top-notch entrepreneur and executive and it's my great pleasure to know her.

summary: Anu Shukla is a serial entrepreneur with over 20 years of high-tech industry experience. She is the Founder& CEO of RewardsPay Inc. Formerly, she was the  founder and CEO of Offerpal Media ( aka Tapjoy, Inc.) She was the Founder and former CEO and Director of MyBuys Inc. (formerly Rubiconsoft) a venture backed  company she started in 2002, .  Prior to RubiconSoft, she was founder and CEO of Rubric, Inc, a Silicon Valley software company that pioneered the explosive new category of Enterprise Marketing Automation systems to collaborate, plan, execute, manage and measure marketing campaigns.  Rubric eMA is used by F500 and e-commerce companies to drive revenues and build "sticky" customer relationships.  Rubric,  was acquired for $366 million in February 2000. Prior to founding Rubric, Ms. Shukla was the VP of Marketing and Product Strategy at Versata (VATA) .As the COO at mFactory, Inc., Ms. Shukla raised significant growth capital and helped it make a successful transition from a technology start-up to ongoing commercial concern. The company was acquired by Quark.Ms. Shukla was Vice President of Worldwide Marketing and Product Management at Compuware/Uniface Corporation (CPWR), where sales grew from $10 million to more than $85 million  .  She played a major role in Compuware's $433 million acquisition of Uniface.Ms. Shukla served on the Board of Directors of FWE&E (Forum for Women Entrepreneurs and Executives) , International Museum of Women ( IMOW.org) and the Advisory Board for the Leavey School of Business, Santa Clara University.  She was named to the Computer Industry “Dream Team” by Business 2.0 magazine in 2004, awarded the YSU Distinguished Alumni award in 2005, and the Entrepreneur of the Year by the Washington D.C. based Dialogue on Diversity organization in 2005. Ms Shukla served as the commencement speaker and was awarded  an Honorary Doctorate from her Alma Mater YSU in 2008.Specialties: CEO, Entrepreneur, Marketing, Internet Advertising, Virtual Currency Monetiztion, Social Networking, Social Games
name: Anu Shukla
title: Founder & CEO at RewardsPay Inc.
